description.en: Control your Gledopto LED Controllers (ZigBee) with Homey!
description.nl: Gebruik je Gledopto LED Controllers (ZigBee) met Homey!

instruction.en:
1. Connect the LED product to the controller see section `wire connection`.
 2. Start the device searching on the ZigBee Light Link Gateway, it could take some time.
If the Gateway does not find the device, plug power off/on or make a reset.
3. The Gateway found your device and you can assign it to the different rooms/zones/groups.
4. Now you can use the device.

Reset:
1. Switch on your device.          2. Now switch off and on within 2 seconds.
3. Repeat off/on four times.
4. Reset is done when the device is switched on in the fifth time and the light stays on after blinking 4 times.

hint.en: This setting determines the time in seconds it takes to dim from one level to another.
hint.nl: Deze instelling bepaalt de duur in seconden van het dimmen van een niveau naar een ander.
